value:
$WmMPID_ウルフ,ch01_45_Wolf_M_Normal,Face|I see... So that's the situation.$k$p$WmMPID_ザガロ,ch01_49_Zagallo_M_Normal,Face|Enemy forces appearing endlessly
from other worlds...$k$p$WmMPID_ロシェ,ch01_46_Roche_M_Normal,Face|You've been fighting a difficult battle
for quite some time, haven't you?$k$p$WmMPID_ビラク,ch01_48_Virac_M_Normal,Face|It's not hard to understand why—an
abundant land like this makes for
an obvious target.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Yes... It was for the sake of Askr that
$Nu sent for you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If possible, I would like as many
Heroes as possible to lend their
strength to defending Askr.$k$p...But I am aware that this request
will be difficult, and is for the cause
of a country other than your own.$k$pEven so, can I ask for your
cooperation?$k$p$WmMPID_マリス,ch01_47_Maris_F_Normal,Face|I don't give a damn about any of that.
If the pay's good, I'm happy to work
for anyone.$k$p$WmMPID_ロシェ,ch01_46_Roche_M_Normal,Face|The longer a war draws out, the more
children it will leave without parents.
Wolf, don't you think... Huh? Wolf?$k$p$WmMPID_ウルフ,ch01_45_Wolf_M_Normal,Face|...$k$pUnderstood. We, the Coyote's Men,
shall lend our aid to the Order of
Heroes as well.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Really?! Thank you!$k$p$WmMPID_ウルフ,ch01_45_Wolf_M_Normal,Face|But do not expect us to bend the
knee to you. Our true allegiance lies
toward Lord Hardin, and him alone.$k$pWe will cooperate with you, but our
loyalty to him will never waver.
Now, I believe we are done here.$k$p$WmMPID_ロシェ,ch01_46_Roche_M_Normal,Face|...Hey, wait! Wolf! Sedgar!
Vyland?! Hold on!$k$pE-excuse us, Prince Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pThey left...$k$p$WmMPID_マリス,ch01_47_Maris_F_Normal,Face|Knights often bear a lot of weight on
their shoulders, but I get the feeling
those four have led very difficult lives.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Right. Um, Prince Alfonse...
Is the Hardin they admire...?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes. He was summoned to Askr
before Wolf and the rest.$k$p...But not as the Prince Hardin they
knew—not as the man called Coyote
who fought alongside Prince Marth.$k$pThe Hardin in this world fell to the
corruption of the Darksphere, and
became the Dark Emperor...$k$p
